text:
Kurve | Front End / Full Stack Developer | London UK based | REMOTE, freelance.

Kurve is a building tools to make it easier for sales people and recruiters to do their jobs efficiently. Should ideally be in a timezone near GMT.

Tech Stack: Chrome Extension, Javascript, React, Redux, NodeJS

Email me at jobs@kurve.co.uk Can check more about me here: linkedin.com/in/orengreen
